p: Hematological examination was performed using an automatic hematological analyzer (Abacus 380 Hematology Analyzers). The hematological parameters measured were white blood cells (WBC), red blood cell (RBC), granulocyte (GRA), lymphocyte (LYM), hemoglobin (HGB), hematocrit (HCT), mean corpuscular volume (MCV), mean corpuscular hemoglobin (MCH), mean corpuscular hemoglobin concentration (MCHC), red cell distribution width (RDW), platelets (PLT), and mean platelet volume (MPV).
